extendedInfo.description: With over 800 unique multiple-choice test questions, Biology Examstutor is an essential A Level Biology exam revision app. Instant feedback for each question helps you identifying the correct response to questions you answer incorrectly. Reinforcing your understanding of key topics you may be examined on at A Level.Combined with the facility to link to further revision support on examstutor.com used by leading schools and colleges across the UK, this app will be updated with additional topic tests and questions throughout your studies.Exam Board Revision Pathways, map key topics in your AS and A2 Biology Exams. Revise a specific Topic, or create Random Tests, with questions drawn from all key topics in a specific Unit, or from across the entire A level.A level Biology is an advanced qualification studied by UK and international students prior to attending University. This app can be used by anyone wishing to develop an advanced understanding of Biology.Features include:Â· Topic Tests: Covering over 50+ examined topicsÂ· Random Tests: Choose the number of questions randomly drawn from either the entire A level or the unit you are currently revising.Â· Instant Feedback : Correct Answers identified if you get a question wrong, reinforcing learning.Â· Revision Pathways : Exam Board mappingÂ· Report Card : tracking your performance in all the tests you take, whilst charting your understanding of each topic prior to you sitting exams.Topics covered include:Big molecules, Cell Structure, Enzymes, Eukaryotic Cells, Plasma Membrane, Prokaryotic Cells, Blood Vessels, Circulation, Controlling Heart Rate, Digestion, Osmosis, Phloem, Stem Structure, Transport of respiratory gases, Phloem Tissue, Xylem, Diversity, Genes and genetics, Genetic Engineering, Nucleic Acids, Cell cycle, Variation, Photosynthesis, Respiration, Homeostasis, Nerve Cell Structure, Synapses, Cloningâ¦â¦Exam Boards mapped include:Â· AQAÂ· OCRÂ· EdexcelÂ· WJECÂ· CIECopyright (c) Examstutor Limited 2011

reviews.title: Wish I had it sooner
reviews.comment: This is such a great app. There is a choice of loads of different exam boards. Contains loads of different questions and answers, also has a section where it teaches you subjects if you had missed any lessons at school
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: If studying with OCR-do not buy!!
reviews.comment: Very poor, had a lots of irrelevant topics that are not part of the syllabus! Also missing out much of the relevant information! It had questions with the wrong answers that contradicted the previous question. Imbeciles.
reviews.author: Dan Tebbs

reviews.title: Thumbs up
reviews.comment: Very easy to use, informative but simplistic, very happy with this application
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: This apps an easy way to revise. Simple, but enough. Now lets hope i pass!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Half of the app wouldn\'t work
reviews.comment: Couldn\'t use half the items in the app
reviews.author: Charlotte Willis

reviews.title: I bought this app after trying the demo
reviews.comment: As the title says I bought this app after trying to demo mode and it now says that I have no license to access the apps full feature and that I should buy the full app. Well iv done that and i\'v still got demo mode with no clue how to fix it as I can\'t access the login screen or do anything!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I\'d give no stars where possible.
reviews.comment: I paid for the app but to enter the study room you had to login. I didn\'t hsve a user name or password so couldn\'t use it. Uninstalled. Hope I got my money back.
reviews.author: beverley ward
